statements: SELECT * FROM CapitalStructureAnalysis WHERE company_id = 1;
SELECT company_id, total_capital FROM CapitalStructureAnalysis WHERE debt_financing > equity_financing;
SELECT * FROM CapitalStructureAnalysis WHERE total_capital >= 1000000;
SELECT company_id, debt_financing, equity_financing, total_capital FROM CapitalStructureAnalysis WHERE debt_financing < 50000;
SELECT total_capital, equity_financing FROM CapitalStructureAnalysis WHERE company_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM CapitalStructureAnalysis WHERE company_id = 1
SELECT company_id, total_capital FROM CapitalStructureAnalysis WHERE debt_financing > 100000 ORDER BY total_capital DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM CapitalStructureAnalysis WHERE equity_financing BETWEEN 0.2 AND 0.5 ORDER BY company_id
SELECT AVG(debt_financing) AS avg_debt, AVG(equity_financing) AS avg_equity FROM CapitalStructureAnalysis
SELECT company_id, total_capital, debt_financing + equity_financing AS total_financing FROM CapitalStructureAnalysis WHERE total_capital >= 500000 ORDER BY total_financing DESC
SELECT * FROM Debt_Financing WHERE debt_amount > 10000
SELECT company_id, interest_rate FROM Debt_Financing WHERE debt_term < 5
SELECT SUM(debt_amount) FROM Debt_Financing
SELECT company_id, shares_issued FROM Equity_Financing WHERE share_price > 20
SELECT * FROM Equity_Financing WHERE equity_amount < 50000
SELECT * FROM Debt_Financing WHERE company_id = 1
SELECT company_id, debt_amount FROM Debt_Financing WHERE interest_rate > 0.05 ORDER BY debt_amount DESC
SELECT company_id, debt_amount, debt_term FROM Debt_Financing WHERE interest_rate < 0.1 AND debt_term > 5
SELECT * FROM Equity_Financing WHERE shares_issued > 100 ORDER BY share_price ASC
SELECT company_id, equity_amount, share_price FROM Equity_Financing WHERE share_price BETWEEN 10 AND 20
SELECT * FROM Debt_Financing ORDER BY debt_amount DESC;
SELECT debt_id, debt_amount, debt_term FROM Debt_Financing WHERE company_id = 1;
SELECT equity_id, equity_amount, equity_share FROM Equity_Financing WHERE investor_id = 5;
SELECT decision_id, company_id, financing_type FROM Capital_Decisions WHERE decision_amount > 100000;
SELECT * FROM Debt_Financing LIMIT 3 OFFSET 2;
SELECT * FROM Debt_Financing WHERE debt_amount > 10000 ORDER BY debt_interest_rate DESC;
SELECT debt_interest_rate, debt_amount FROM Debt_Financing WHERE company_id = 1;
SELECT company_id, COUNT(*) AS total_debts FROM Debt_Financing GROUP BY company_id HAVING total_debts > 3;
SELECT company_id, SUM(debt_amount) AS total_debt_amount FROM Debt_Financing GROUP BY company_id;
SELECT * FROM Equity_Financing WHERE equity_share > 0.1 ORDER BY equity_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM debt_financing;
SELECT company_name, debt_amount FROM equity_financing WHERE debt_amount > 100000;
SELECT company_name, revenue, net_profit FROM financial_performance WHERE revenue > 5000000 AND net_profit < 1000000;
SELECT company_name, debt_equity_ratio FROM capital_structure WHERE debt_equity_ratio BETWEEN 0.5 AND 1.0;
SELECT * FROM equity_financing ORDER BY equity_amount DESC;
SELECT company_name, debt_amount FROM debt_financing WHERE debt_amount > 10000 ORDER BY debt_amount DESC;
SELECT company_name, equity_amount, issued_shares FROM equity_financing WHERE equity_amount < 50000 AND issued_shares > 1000;
SELECT company_name, debt_equity_ratio, preferred_equity_amount FROM capital_structure WHERE debt_equity_ratio BETWEEN 0.5 AND 1 ORDER BY debt_equity_ratio;
SELECT company_name, revenue AS annual_revenue, net_profit AS annual_profit FROM financial_performance WHERE revenue > 1000000 AND net_profit > 50000;
SELECT * FROM debt_financing UNION SELECT * FROM equity_financing;
SELECT * FROM CapitalStructureData ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT company_name, debt_amount FROM CapitalStructureData WHERE equity_amount > 5000;
SELECT company_name, equity_amount, debt_amount FROM CapitalStructureData WHERE debt_amount < 10000 AND equity_amount > 5000;
SELECT * FROM CapitalStructureAnalysis WHERE analysis_result LIKE '%positive%';
SELECT company_id, loan_amount, loan_interest_rate FROM DebtFinancing WHERE loan_amount > 100000 ORDER BY loan_amount DESC;
SELECT company_name, debt_amount, equity_amount FROM CapitalStructureData WHERE debt_amount > 10000 ORDER BY equity_amount DESC;
SELECT company_name, debt_amount, equity_amount FROM CapitalStructureData WHERE debt_amount < equity_amount;
SELECT * FROM DebtFinancing JOIN CapitalStructureData ON DebtFinancing.company_id = CapitalStructureData.id WHERE loan_interest_rate > 5 ORDER BY loan_amount DESC;
SELECT company_name, debt_to_equity_ratio, current_ratio FROM CapitalStructureData JOIN FinancialRatios ON CapitalStructureData.id = FinancialRatios.company_id WHERE debt_to_equity_ratio < 1;

SELECT company_name, capital_structure, analysis_result FROM CapitalStructureData JOIN CapitalStructureAnalysis ON CapitalStructureData.id = CapitalStructureAnalysis.company_id WHERE LENGTH(analysis_result) > 200 ORDER BY company_name ASC;
